name: Leapfrog Viewer Scene
summary: Learn about .LFVIEW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Seequent publishes several geological modeling applications under the Leapfrog brand. These include Leapfrog Geo, Leapfrog Works, and Leapfrog Energy.

Geologists using Leapfrog applications can export the 3D geological scenes they create as LFVIEW files. Other geologists can then open these files with Seequent's free Leapfrog Viewer. This allows geologists who do not have access to paid Leapfrog applications to still view and analyze 3D models created by those apps.

instructions: You can open an LFVIEW file with Leapfrog Viewer (Windows). To download Leapfrog Viewer, you must first create an account with Seequent. After that, you can download, install, and use Leapfrog Viewer for free.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
